pageContext.claim: “THANK YOU @MayorGimenez for following the RULE OF LAW! Sanctuary cities make our country LESS SAFE!”
pageContext.analysis: There’s no evidence that "sanctuary" policies had anything to do with crime trends in Miami-Dade County. Mayor Carlos Gimenez said the county can't attribute its drop in crimes just to its reversal of its sanctuary policy. Instead, Gimenez pointed to various efforts the county took to decrease its crime rate using new tactics and neighborhood-based crime prevention, such as creating job-training programs for high-crime areas.
